MS MCQs

    Identify Exceptions with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365 and Azure IoT

    »

    1. Which of the following need to be modified to change the rules used to raise alerts with the Connected Field Service template application?

      Dynamics 365

      IoT Hub Routing Rules

      Azure Stream Analytics Job

      Azure Cosmos DB

      Customer Asset


    2. To add additional fields to the Alert Data on the IoT Alert in Dynamics 365 what do you need to modify or create?

      The Select Into statement for the AlertQueue

      The Logic App that processes the AlertQueue

      Create an Azure Function to add the additional data

      Create a workflow that runs on the IoT Alert when created

      You cannot modify the data that is stored in the Alert Data field


    3. If you had static rules and stateless processing for anomaly detection and wanted to simplify the creation of IoT Alerts what would be an alternative?

      Replace the current process with a workflow in Dynamics 365 to ingest and evaluate the device data

      The Logic App that processes the AlertQueue

      Create an Azure Function to add the additional data

      Create a workflow that runs on the IoT Alert when created

      You cannot modify the data that is stored in the Alert Data field


    4. In order to modify the Azure Stream Analytics Job to change the criteria you must?

      Disable the crm-to-IotHub Logic App

      Disable the iot-to-crm Logic App

      Delete and re-create the Stream Analytics Job

      Stop the Stream Analytics job

      Put Dynamics 365 into Admin Mode
